name: Crypto Price Tracker
description:
Simple extension to track price of Crypto Currencies

Sources: Binance, OKX, Coingecko

Add coins by Binance symbols, for example: "BTC/USDT"
complete list on binance: https://www.binance.com/indexSpa.html
OKX pairs: "LTC/USDT"
Coingecko pairs: "bitcoin/usd"
Using api.coingecko.com

Complete guide: https://github.com/alipirpiran/Crypto-Price-Tracker-for-Gnome-Shell#readme

** if it faced error after update:
**Restart Gnome-shell. (ALT+F2, r, Enter)
